table.name: vtiger_receivedsms
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receivedsms` ( `receivedsmsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `smsr_name` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `receivedsmsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `smsr_from` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `smsr_to` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `smsr_text_message` text, PRIMARY KEY (`receivedsmsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_receivedsmscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receivedsmscf` ( `receivedsmsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`receivedsmsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_receivedsms_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receivedsms_settings` ( `settings_name` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `settings_value` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`settings_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: vtiger_receivedsms_servers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_receivedsms_servers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `isactive` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `providertype` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `username` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `parameters` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
